data.title: Pinnacle Studio
data.meta_description: Version history and archived downloads page for Pinnacle Studio. Make timeless movies with ease. Whether you need basic or advanced capabilities, Studio allows you to enhance your memories with fun effects in seconds and then effortlessly preserve and sha
data.text:
This is the version history page for Pinnacle Studio, showing the last 20 software updates. You can return to the main page for this software by clicking here.

Index:

Version 23 (Aug 16, 2019)

Version 21 (Aug 17, 2017)

Version 20.5 (Apr 20, 2017)

Version 20 (Aug 20, 2016)

Version 11.1 (Jul 7, 2007)

Version 11 (Apr 25, 2007)

Version 23

Release Date: Aug 16, 2019

Please refer to this page for a complete list of what's new in version 23

Version 21

Release Date: Aug 17, 2017

NEW Paint effects

NEW Morph transitions

NEW Effects from NewBlue

ENHANCED! 360 video editing

Version 20.5

Release Date: Apr 20, 2017

NEW! Split Screen video

NEW! Stop Motion Animation

NEW! Author DVDs with new menu templates

ENHANCED! Multi-camera video editing

NEW! HEVC (H.265) import

ENHANCED! Live Screen Capture

Audio Ducking to balance dialog and music

3D import, editing and export

NEW! Easy Track Transparency

NEW! Motion Tracking

NEW! 360Â° video editing

NEW! Effects from NewBlue (details)

NEW! Stop Motion Animation

Version 19.5.1

Release Date: Jun 14, 2016

This patch provides improvements to functionality and stability, and it includes the Muserk Sound Effects library

Version 19.5

Release Date: Apr 19, 2016

This patch includes several fixes to stability and performance, as well as improvements to existing features

NEW! Multi-camera editing for 2 cameras

NEW! Stop Motion Animation

NEW! Optimized for Intel 6th

Version 19

Release Date: Sep 30, 2015

Version 16

Release Date: Sep 2, 2012

Version 11.1.2

Release Date: Feb 27, 2008

Support of H264 files captured with Pinnacle Video Transfer

Crash of Studio plus when closing Scorefitter and Studio quickly during clip preview

On AVCHD discs that are played back in Panasonic cameras, the AVCHD stream is incorrectly displayed as two â€œscenesâ€

Hang at specific point in TL playing specific with imported DVD title.

Preview gets stuck on various frames playing specific with imported DVD title.

Added support for 1920x1080 AVCHD Export

Fixed: Missing burner error

Version 11.1

Release Date: Jul 7, 2007

Please refer to the release notes for a full list of changes
